title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Today’s guest is Louise Habakus and she is the co-founder and Director of theCenter for Personal Rights – a non... <!--more--> profile advocacy organization dedicated to the protection of vaccination choice as an essential human and civil right – and sits on the Steering Committee of the Coalition for Vaccine Safety.
Before becoming a certified health practitioner in Integrative Nutrition and the founder of Life Health Choices, Louise was a former managing director of Putnam Investments and a corporate VP for Prudential Financial.
She has two vaccine injured children which led to her commitment and advocacy for vaccine safety and freedom for vaccine chioice.
